sentences.en: He missed a three-point attempt at the buzzer.
sentences.cn: 终场哨响时，他投三分球未中。

sentences.en: America's tests assumed a three-point hit over two years.
sentences.cn: 美国的抗压测试假设两年内损失3个百分点。

sentences.en: He often puts air balls from outside the three-point line.
sentences.cn: 他经常在3分线外投空心球。
